title: Collection Description Scheme
description: A grouping of multiple ObjectGroups for a particular use case, purpose or implementation. Where the same objects within the same collection might be described by more than one ObjectGroup for different purposes (for examples, a 'Darwin Fossil Mammals' collection description might overlap with a 'Offsite Palaeontology' collection description), this class can be used to distinguish between them and avoid double-counting of metrics in queries against the data.

properties.name: basisOfScheme
properties.description: A summary of the basis or purpose for the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasObjectGroup
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ObjectGroup class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: hasSchemeMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the SchemeMeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasSchemeTerm
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the SchemeTerm class.

properties.name: isDistinctObjects
properties.description: A flag to designate whether a physical object may be described by more than one ObjectGroup within the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

properties.name: schemeName
properties.description: A short descriptive name given to the CollectionDescriptionScheme.
